sourceMeaningMnemonic: There's a <radical>tsunami</radical> coming, so you put your <radical>fins</radical> on, open your <radical>mouth</radical> wide, and try to <kanji>run alongside</kanji> it.
meaningInfo: Your mouth is open so you can scream, because this is probably a bad idea.
readingMnemonic: You're able to <kanji>run alongside</kanji> the tsunami for about ten seconds before everything <reading>en</reading>ds (<ja>えん</ja>).
readingInfo: Okay, so maybe trying to run alongside a tsunami with just some fins and a mouth full of screams and terror wasn't the best idea. But at least everything ended while you did... uh... something unique?
